Always do more than you are expected to do.
Don't be a wannabe. You are special, and you are good at something.
You won't live forever, so do what you think is right.
Be a good time manager. All-nighter is evil and unnecessary.
You choose what you do because it makes you happy.
Nobody hates you. Maybe you are just not good enough... yet.
